title: The.Magnificent.Seven.1960.720p.BluRay.x264.YIFY.audio_only.mp4
description:
Correct audio only track for The Magnificent Seven (1960) 1080p from YIFY.

That torrent had the director's commentary instead of the movie audio track.

Instructions for VLC.

1. Open Advance. 
2. Add the movie file with wrong audio track.
3. Check show more options.
4. Check Play another media synchronously.
5. Browse to this audio file, click select.
6. Click Play.

If you don't hear the right audio track, go to Audio - Track - and choose another track.

You can also merge the video with the correct audio track using Mkvtoolnix. <a href="
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
